CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 19, 1946, pg. 20, reads: "TESTIMONIAL - Many friends and well-wishers turned out to give their blessings to Robert (Pappy) Williams, who recently was appointed magistrate. A testimonial was held in his behalf at the Crawford Grill last Thursday night. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Men, including Huey Smith, Voyle Parker, Dave Luck, Leon "Pigmeat" Clark on left; Robert E. "Pappy" Williams in background; Jasper "Jap" Washington and Leonard "Big Bill" Williams on right, gathered around tables for turkey dinner in honor of Robert "Pappy" Williams becoming first African American Pittsburgh Police Magistrate, Crawford Grill No. 1
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Crawford Grill (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Banquets--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Williams, Robert E.Parker, James Voyle.
